desc: 100% boost to Atk, 30% boost to critical hit rate,boosts Atk each turn (up to 5 turns), 100% boost Spark damage when HP is below 90%, hugely boosts BB Atk when HP is below 90% & 5% increase to damage received
lore:
A worn jewel of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire, this jewel appears to have been an important centerpiece of an ancient rite.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects, a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail, it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field, if only to better understand its powers.
name: Faded Jewel
